DOC.brief_summary: We conduct cluster randomize control trial compare two antibiotic pre-authorization strategy ( Fellow-based vs. Pharmacist-based ) . We believe amount duration antibiotic consumption would lower pharmacist group clinical outcome would equivalent two group .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study ID Fellow-based VS. Pharmacist-based Antibiotic Pre-authorization
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : A cluster randomize control trial Settings : 6 general medical ward Siriraj Hospital , Bangkok , Thailand
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patient Received least one dose control antibiotic ( Piperacillin/Tazobactam , Imipenem/Cilastatin , Meropenem Doripenem ) Each patient may enrol , he/she receives control antibiotic new episode infection ( least 48 hour apart ) Died prior receive control antibiotic
